pkgmetadata.longdescription: # horsetalk[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/horsetalk.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/horsetalk)[![code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)A library of enums and parsers for common horseracing terminology
